casebody.data:
COLUMBUS COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES
v.
NORTON 249P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 2, 2017 Calvin T. Norton, for Norton, Calvin T. David S. Tedder, Assistant County Attorney, for Columbus County Dept. of Social Services (Ex. Rel.), et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of July 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of August 2017."
